name: Ahdy's Vengeance
description:
Game concept :-

Ahdy’s vengeance is an adventure pixel art game that aims to produce good storytelling in a fun gameplay.

Game genre: -

Adventure, 2D.

World story: -

In a world where hierarchical structure is based on knowledge of Alchemy.

The lowest class of the structure with no knowledge of alchemy are the Ahdians they are the poor good-hearted farmers that works all day to earn the minimum to survive and gets oppressed by the tyrannies of the higher classes.

The middle class are the city suburbs dwellers with basic alchemy they learned to turn iron to silver and make use of it in their daily lives, most of the them worked as soldiers for the Rulers and were rewarded with gold nuggets.

The high class (The Rulers) they had perfected Chrysopoeia the process of transmuting metals into Gold, that symbolized the highest development in nature.

On top of the pyramid stands the one true monarch King Arthur acknowledged by all, reigning over all with his great power harnessing Alchemy to carry out with his magnum opus and create the philosopher stone and Achieve immortality, with his great librarian Planty the keeper and protector of the King's sacred scrolls and secrets of alchemy.

Protagonist story: -

The story of our young protagonist Ahdy  an Ahdian  starts when he sees his own father getting killed By General Reynolds for committing the crime of stealing high alchemy books and practicing the rituals as a low class

The general sees little Ahdy and chase him but Ahdy manages to escape the village.

for long years Ahdy trains himself physically and spiritually and learning the ways of alchemy.

after 10 years Ahdy returns to the city, seeking vengeance for his father and attaining the end of this forsaken system.

Development tools: -
  • Unity Engine + Visual Studio
  • Aseprite (Pixel Art)
  • FL Studio (Music)
Assets Used: -
  • “Free Pixel Font – Thaleah"
  • “Medieval Action - FX Pack 2.0”
  • “Classic Footstep SFX”
 Full version plans: -
  • Enhance the combat system significantly.
  • Add more RPG elements (physical skill tree/ alchemy skill tree).
  • Add reward systems to keep the player motivated to play.
  • Add more in-depth story elements.
  • More challenging boss fights.
How To Play: -

Use “WASD” to move.

“Space” Key to jump.

“Left Click” to attack.
